title: Altered
description: At first, I saw him as everyone else did.But then, I saw him for who he really was.Recognized the beauty beneath the pain.Loved the quirks disguising the insecurity.Embraced the man who hid behind the boy.But there was so much more…More I didn’t know.And once I did, I couldn’t letgo…Of the boy.The man.The lover……even if his past is threateningour future.Nothing will alter what we’ve built.
author: Kelly Cain
